title: Pupil-teacher ratio, primary
name: se.prm.enrl.tc.zs
readme: Primary school pupil-teacher ratio is the average number of pupils per teacher in primary school.

fields.name: Country Code
fields.description: ISO 3-digit ISO code extended to include regional codes e.g. EUR, ARB etc

fields.name: Value
fields.description: Primary school pupil-teacher ratio is the average number of pupils per teacher in primary school.
